Introduction

Sim Yejun, known mononymously as Yejun, is a South Korean singer and songwriter currently signed under Warner Music Korea. He is best known as the youngest member of the boy group F.CUZ.

In addition to his group activities, Yejun has pursued a solo career under his full name, showcasing a more personal and introspective musical style through various digital releases in both Korean and Japanese markets.
